panels.narration: * Wind has left The Furry/Yiffy Room

right.text: He flooded and left. I've seen it before.

left.text: Sorry you had to see that, fellow furs. ^^;

right.text: everyone else in the room, please don't blame us

left.text: He incriminated himself, and caused all the problems to begin with

right.text: All because he's a damn idiot who decided to discriminate against my Charmander buddy. He's no different than a racist, in my mind.
